content: Now your kids can walk tall just like the mighty Bigfoot using these Sports Stomp Walker stilts. They come fitted with big ol’ soft foam feet that are easy to balance on, and are designed to handle children up to 100 pounds.

Keep yourself from spending all your money at once by placing your disposable income in this money maze bank. After inserting the money inside, a locking mechanism is activated and can only be released after solving the complex ball maze.

Make fresh restaurant quality pasta right in your own kitchen using this homemade noodle maker. After adding in fresh ingredients, you’ll get to choose from 10 different noodle types to create – like pasta, ramen, and soba.

Avoid accidentally tripping and knocking over your shelter in the dead of night by pitching your tent using this glow in the dark rope. This sturdy rope measures 32 feet in length and gives off a bright neon glow so you can see exactly where they’re laid out.

Make your pool day even better by bringing along a few slices in the form of this pizza slice inflatable pool float. This giant vinyl float measures 48 inches in diameter and comes covered in gooey pepperoni and cheese slices.

Keep your energetic pooch entertained for hours on end by installing this self tugging dog toy in your yard. Once affixed to the ground, simply attach the knotted rope toy to the 55 inch pole and watch as little Rover goes wild.

Give any formal outfit a vibrant touch of geeky flair by putting on these Star Wars character socks. Decorated like your favorite characters, they features 200 needle count stitching in addition to reinforced heels and toes for a superb fit.

Camouflage yourself while traversing mosquito country by using this mosquito repellent wristband. This ingenious little rubber band easily slips on to provide over 120 hours of mosquito repelling relief without the sticky feeling normally associated with sprays.

Indulge in a cheeseburger without any of the caloric consequences with this fast food themed bed set. The incredibly soft duvet and pillow covers display a heavenly bacon cheeseburger image that makes this the perfect bed set for any foodie.

Avoid heartache from the opposite sex by trading your undeserving boyfriend in for the perfect man chocolate. He’s sweet, a great listener, and has a physique that’ll put any guy to shame. Best of all, he’s made out of rich milk chocolate.

Get that fresh draft beer taste from any store-bought brand by placing the can or bottle inside this Fizzics draft beer system. After placing the beer inside, simply pull the lever to pour out a frosty ale with a sensational body and flavor.

Who needs a bug out bag when you can carry everything you need inside this survival kit in a flashlight? Apart from an ultra bright LED light, the weatherproof canister comes packed with 7 metal tins containing indispensable survival gear.

Create a more welcoming environment for politicians and lobbyists by placing this “We Accept Bribes” doormat out front. This comical and functional doormat features a polyvinyl chloride non-slip backing to prevent accidents, making it ideal for outdoor use.

Help your young Imperial establish his independence at nighttime using this stormtrooper night light and flashlight. The helmet acts as a soothing night light that automatically transforms into a handy flashlight when it is picked up.

Stay dry and toasty by seeking refuge in this extreme hooded waterproof blanket. This 100% waterproof and windproof blanket is large enough to accommodate two people and comes lined with soft fleece on the inside to provide extra warmth.

Add some color to your battlestation with this rainbow light up mechanical keyboard. The fastest and most programmable keyboard around, it features a low-profile layout and dual processors to ensure swift transitions with minimal fatigue.

Bring your humble abode’s plain walls to life using this living wall garden starter kit. Ideal for homes with limited space, this vertical garden installs in seconds so you can keep a lively and healthy garden on any wall without making a mess.

Give your fragile phone the protection it deserves by placing this plush ball iPhone case over it. Each finely crafted case comes covered in small and vibrantly colored plush balls that not only protect your phone but feel good to the touch as well.

All kitties like lurking in the shadows – so keep your feline friend protected and happy by buying him a cat cave bed. Handmade from felted New Zealand wool, each bed has a truly unique look and shape to match your special fluffball.

Kick back on casual Fridays while you toil away at endless TPS reports with the foot rest hammock at your desk. This small hammock attaches to each end of the desk and is completely adjustable to fully suit your lounging needs.

Create some out of this world treats with the hemisphere cake mold. The cake mold is made from anodized aluminum and helps you create perfectly round cakes you can decorate to fit an educational or sports theme, the possibilities are deliciously endless.

Complement your tunes with some killer visual effects by playing them out of these levitating Bluetooth speakers. Apart from providing lossless audio, the embedded LEDs give off brilliant visual effects as the speaker orb hovers and rotates clockwise.

Grow healthy and organic herbs right from your windowsill using these gardens in a can. Ideal for homes with limited space – simply pop open a can, add a little water, and watch as it grows over time into a lovely plant without any of the mess.

Spark up in style by swapping your plain lighter out for this 9mm gun torch lighter. Modeled after the iconic firearm, this refillable butane lighter shoots out a steady blue flame when you cock the hammer and pull the trigger.

Take the guess work out of trying to decipher what your check engine lights mean using this automobile health monitor. The sensor plugs directly into your car’s dash and sends notifications to your phone in simple terms that anyone can understand.

Make learning fun for your little scholars in training by giving them this crystal growing kit. Both easy and safe to use, the kit comes with everything necessary to grow dozens of brightly colored crystals that can be molded into fun shapes like stars and dolphins.

Ensure important belongings remain safe while your vehicle is unattended by storing them inside this car console vault. This heavy duty 12 gauge rolled plate steel vault easily installs in 10 minutes and features a 3 point locking system that’s resistant to prying.

The Justice League’s top dogs are going head to head like never before with these Rock ‘Em Sock ‘Em superheroes. Once they’re in position, you can pummel your opponent until their head gets knocked off their block.

Keep your tootsies nice and cozy on the coldest of days by putting on these Yeti heated slippers. These furry slippers are extremely soft to the touch and can be plugged in via USB to keep your toes nice and warm on cold mornings.

Feel the music flow throughout your entire body by strapping on this wearable bass system. The vest adjusts to various sizes and fits comfortably without hindering movement so you can feel the bass without disturbing those around you.

Enjoy hours of skating without having to deal with the crowds using this backyard ice rink kit. The kit includes everything you’ll need to transform your plain yard into a cool 20 x 40 foot rink that all the neighborhood kids will be dying to skate on.

Break up your family like a true Pokemaster during a rousing game of Pokemon edition Monopoly. Every aspect of the game – from the pieces to the game board itself – is customized to reflect the iconic cartoon and card game.

Keep your manly mane looking clean and well groomed throughout the day with help from these beard wipes. Each pack includes 10 unscented wipes that instantly clean and condition your burly beard whenever you need to freshen up.

Make your home a more habitable place by sticking your kicks inside this shoe deodorizer/sanitizer/dryer. Simply place your stinky shoes inside the device and it will kill up to 99% of bacteria and viruses without the damaging effects of chemicals.

Give your humble abode a bit of millennial flair with this poop emoji pillow. Everyone’s favorite fecal emoji comes to life in the form of an adorably soft pillow that’ll put a smile on your face even on your shittiest of days.

Take a shot to the face in more ways than one by drinking your favorite poison from these bulletproof shotglasses. Made from high quality glass, each one of these 1.5 ounce shot glasses creates the illusion they’re being penetrated by an incoming bullet.

Stay dry while trudging through Mother Nature’s wettest terrains by wearing these waterproof socks. Each pair features a singular 3 layer construction designed to provide a comfortable and breathable fit no matter what the conditions are like.

Enjoy your favorite roast wherever you travel to by bringing along this portable coffee maker. Its ingenious design fits everything you’ll need from a metal filter dripper to a grinder with a foldable handle, so you can whip up a fresh cup of Joe on the go.

The future has arrived in the form of this app controlled personal robot. Standing at 4 feet tall, this little guy features fully articulated limbs powered by 10 motors to create life-like movement you can control using your smartphone.

Give your home a breathtaking nocturnal appearance using this landscape laser projector. This dual color laser projects a myriad of tiny bright dots onto the surface of your home that will create an enchanting nighttime atmosphere.

Avoid overcooking your prime cuts by keeping on eye on them using this Bluetooth BBQ thermometer. This water resistant thermometer works seamlessly with both iOS and Android so you can monitor the temperature and state of the meat while you grill.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Hair Dye
content: Shine bright in the dead of night by giving yourself a makeover with this glow in the dark hair dye. This peroxide and ammonia-free vegan friendly dye comes in a range of vibrant colors that come to life under UV lighting.

There’s always a comfy seat with your name on it when you show up to the tailgate with this backpack cooler chair. Made from heavy duty polyester, it sports a durable metal frame with a 250 pound weight capacity along with 16x10x7″ of storage space.

Make breakfast fun for the kids by animating their breakfast using this bear pancake pan. The pan comes shaped like a cute little teddy bear so you’ll get the perfect shape every time no matter how bad your cooking skills may be.

Add some cool visual effects to your jam session using this light up auxiliary cable. Apart from providing high quality sound, the cable lights up in a bright neon color that pulses to the beat of the music and is available in four different hues.

Everyone’s favorite zombie series comes alive like never before inside the pages of The Walking Dead pop-up book. The book depicts five key elements from the series in terrifyingly gory detail – like the zombie in the well, the secrets of Terminus, and the prison.

Test your luck as you try to avoid getting your face spattered while playing this Pie Face roulette game. After spinning, each player places their head on the chin rest and begins turning the handle until someone gets a face full of pie.

Turn virtually any surface into your personal canvas using these removable dry erase board decals. The decals are available in five distinct sizes and are designed to be easily adhered and removed without leaving the surface all sticky.

Play a fun prank on friends by giving them a tiny jolt using this electric shock prank puzzle cube. Disguised as a Rubik’s cube-like puzzle, it gives the player a small shock when they attempt to solve it by turning the pieces.

Add a playful touch to any room with this multicolor nice drawer cabinet. The whimsical design features nine differently shaped drawers positioned both vertically and horizontally, ideal for adding a bit of color to your home decor.

titleEN: Pulp Fiction Jules Winnfield Lawn Gnome
content: Keep your garden safe from all sorts of threats by placing this Pulp Fiction Jules Winnfield lawn gnome on the job. This little bad motherfucker totes a gun in hand and stands on a platform engraved with the classic “say what again” quote onto it.

Increase your chances of survival in an emergency situation by carrying this sardine can survival kit. Despite its compact size, it holds a plethora or useful tools like matches, first aid instructions, and duct tape inside a sturdy waterproof case.

Improve productivity while you work by swapping your old desk out for this height adjustable standing desk. Crafted from high quality plywood, this sturdy desk is available in three distinct sizes and can be manually adjusted to fit anyone from a child to an adult.

Keep your skin looking healthy and radiant by slathering on this organic coffee bean scrub. It is made from all natural ingredients including coconut oil, sea salt, and vitamin E – and features a delightful coffee scent that’ll leave you feeling fresh all day.

Give your pup a little extra room to lounge around by moving him into this dog bunk bed. Designed for small breeds, this durable pet home offers your furry friend both a cozy indoor environment and an open air rooftop so he can enjoy the weather.

Let your imagination run wild by transforming your hand into a majestic little centaur. Made from soft flexible vinyl, this hand puppet’s hooves measure two inches long and come with a muscular three and a half inch torso that goes directly over your middle finger.

Turn your boring noodle meal into a culinary sensation with help from the Prison Ramen recipe book. It comes full of colorful recipes like “sloppy Ramen Joe” and Danny Trejo’s “Machete Ramen” along with select stories from the inmates who made them.

Bring nearly 100 years of rock ‘n’ roll history to your home by proudly hanging up this vintage guitar poster. It displays 64 iconic models ranging from 1912 all the way up to 2010 – such as Kurt Cobain’s 1968 Mosrite Mark IV Gospel and Eric Clapton’s 1956 Fender.

titleEN: Do One Thing Every Day That Scares You
content: Make life worth living by stepping out of your comfort zone using this “Do One Thing Every Day That Scares You” journal. This unique journal comes jam packed with a year’s worth of encouraging mottoes and fear-facing prompts to motivate you to get out there.

Give fellow employees a piece of your mind by sipping your morning coffee out of this grenade mug. This 4.5 inch tall ceramic mug is styled like a classic grenade right down to the pin, and sports a comical message that’ll get your co-workers attention.

Quit playing the guessing game every time you jump in the shower! This helpful digital shower head features six different spray settings along with a small LED display that tells you the exact temperature of the flowing water.

Become a world-class sommelier using this scratch and sniff wine book as your guide. It covers every facet of wine, from its basic components to more advanced lessons such as telling the difference between a Syrah and a Sangiovese.

No camping trip should ever be had without these 12-in-1 multi-tool scissors packed. Crated from stainless steel, they’re designed to detach when positioned at a 90-degree angle and feature everything from wrench to jar opener and wire stripper.

Improve your acceleration on the field by working out with the speed resistance training parachute. It features a 360 degree rotation belt and a free motion ring in addition to a quick release buckle so you can unhinge yourself mid-sprint.

Put alternative fuel sources to the test by building yourself a toy car that runs on air. This kit is great for learning about the basics of propulsion via compressed air and comes with a built-in pump bar with a pressure meter for easy operation.

Pour the perfect black and tan effortlessly with help from this beer layering tool. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or an amateur bartender, this easy to use device will have you pouring a pub-style drink right in the comfort of home.

Fall asleep comfortably to a soothing soundtrack using these wireless headband headphones. The headband is made from an ultra soft hypoallergenic fabric and is Bluetooth enabled so you can easily connect it to any smartphone or tablet.

Protect yourself and all your gear from the elements by heading out with this expedition camping tent. It features sturdy anodized tent poles, a double wall design to eliminate condensation and enough room to store your motorcycle.

Keep your eyes fresh long into your marathon gaming session by going in with these anti-fatigue gaming glasses. Weighing only 25 grams, they feature a proprietary coating that blocks out high-energy blue light, glare and UV.

Stave off the cold in true cat lover fashion by getting your mitts on these cat paw gloves. These adorable one size fits all gloves are available in five different colors and are the purrrrrfect accessory for staying warm in the winter.

Quit your day job and get on the fast-track to success using this gold panning kit. Just walk to up to your local river or park, scoop up some dirt and watch in amazement as you find <del>nothing of value</del> gold nugget after nugget right below your feet.

Take part in the time-honored tradition of cheese making with this DIY goat cheese kit. The kit comes with easy to follow instructions and includes everything needed to make delicious fresh cheese in your own kitchen.

Brighten up the decor of your kid’s room by adding some accent lighting using this lichtbloem DIY lamp. The kit contains everything from optical fibers to a clothes peg and lithium cell so you can easily craft your very own light flower.

When the power fails, the indestructible emergency light will ensure you’re never left in the dark. Great for both civilian and military applications, this reusable light comes in a high-impact container that can handle any environment and provides up to 30 hours of light.

Lug around your gear without creating a cumbersome bulk using this ultra slim laptop backpack. This all black backpack features a padded compartment designed to house up to a 15.6″ laptop in addition to other compartments for a tablet, cables, and documents.

Always look fresh to def by using this beard shaping tool. Ideal for both long and short beards, this versatile grooming accessory makes it remarkably easy to maintain perfect symmetry in tricky places like the cheek and neck line.

Turn your local park into a winter wonderland by hitting the hills with this inflatable snow tube sled. Ideal for adults and kids alike, the sled is made from a super heavy duty material, features double reinforced handles, and is coated with a cold-resistant treatment.

Have a laugh at the expense of others all year round by hanging this “Awkward Family Photos” calendar in your home or office. Whether it’s inappropriate poses between siblings, or tacky outfits and hairstyles, each picture will leave you in stitches.

Stimulate your furry friend’s senses during his next meal by serving his chow on this food maze dog bowl. This dishwasher-safe bowl provides a fun challenge for your pup while slowing down the rate at which he scarfs down those delicious brown pellets.

The world’s most beloved drinking game has gotten a major upgrade thanks to these hexagonal shaped beer pong cups. They’re designed to be exceptionally durable, minimize movement during play and fit perfect alongside one another for easy re-racks.

Easily carry everything you need to survive the great outdoors in your pocket with this compact wilderness survival tool. Forged from metal, this credit card sized tool contains six useful tools ranging from fish hooks to snare locks and sewing needles.

Ensure your infant is in good health while they slumber by placing the Snuza baby movement monitor on him. The device clips over your baby’s diaper waistband and vibrates to stimulate movement from your baby – if no movement is sensed, it emits an audible alarm.

Keep an eye on your adventurous pets even when you’re not around by placing these digital pet trackers collar on them. This waterproof tag contains all your pet’s contact info, works within a 200 foot range, and can be used by anyone with the app to locate them.

Put your bounty-hunting skills to the test as you try to locate Chewbacca inside the pages of the Where’s The Wookie book. It’s up to you to scour places like the Jawa market and Ewok village in order to find and capture this notorious Rebel scum.

This multi-tool survival axe is the only tool you’ll need next time you head into the wild. Made from carbon steel, you’ll be able to easily perform tasks like cut down a tree, tell time, shoot an arrow, or single-handedly rebuild civilization.

Experience total serenity during your next soak by resting your noggin on this bathtub spa pillow. This waterproof two-panel pillow comes padded with two inches of ultra soft foam and is equipped with seven high quality suction cups that won’t slip off when wet.

These wooden grilling planks provide your prime cuts with all the flavor of a wood smoker, right on your charcoal or gas grill! The planks are selected from the best Northern White Cedar and are then trimmed and dried to maximize flavor over an open fire.

Yoga enthusiasts and sleepyheads rejoice – this puntastic “namasty in bed” pillowcase is here to make your slumber more pleasant. This standard-size pillowcase measures 20″ x 30″ and is made from soft cotton.

Get smarter about the way you dispose of garbage using this intelligent waste system. Instead of taking up precious space with three separate waste containers you’ll be able to fit all your recyclables, organic materials, and regular trash in one convenient place.

Instantly brighten up any plain or drab room using one of these adorable rainbow flower cushions. This machine washable cushion measures nearly two feet in diameter and features a soft and cuddly plush exterior – making it ideal for snuggling.

Enjoy a hot meal even if there’s no microwave in sight by packing your cooked meal inside these steel insulated food containers. They’re made from 18/8 stainless steel, are leak-proof and designed to keep the contents hot or cold for up to 5 hours.

Treat your eyes and ears to a wonderful show next time feel like listening to some tunes from this LED Bluetooth cube speaker. Compatible with both Android and Apple products, it delivers high-fidelity sound while the internal LED pulses in vibrant colors to the beat.

Conquer any rough terrain you encounter after assembling this R/C Toyota Land Cruiser kit. Designed for dedicated off-road R/C car enthusiasts, this polycarbonate  true-to-scale Cruiser is set on a CR-01 chassis and comes with a 4-ling suspension.

Turn the foulest of watering holes into a viable drinking source with this water filtration bottle. Capable of filtering up to 4,000 liters, it removes all viruses, parasites, bacteria, and other microbial waterborne pathogens without causing an unpleasant taste.

Shine brighter than anyone on the the dace floor by complementing your look using these flashing LED earrings. They’re battery powered and are designed to glow in seven vivid colors making them ideal accessories for parties and festivals.

Keep all your dining utensils from spilling over when you dine al fresco by storing everything in this wicker basket picnic organizer. It sports a durable metal frame and features seven compartments designed to accommodate everything from napkins to plates.

Stay on top of your fitness goals by monitoring your daily activity using this heart rate and activity tracking bracelet. Featuring a sturdy and waterproof frame, it’s designed to track everything from distance walked to calories burned.

Enjoy your favorite time-hopping trilogy like never before by engaging in a rousing game of Back To The Future Monopoly. Rather than amass property, you jump through time using your small token to collect different locations.

titleEN: Bucket List Scratch Off World Map
content: Live the adventurous life you’ve always envisioned by using this bucket list scratch off world map as your guide. Each country comes with a list of exotic destinations and activities to be completed before you can scratch it off and reveal the artwork underneath.

Bring your vehicle into the 21st century by equipping it with this smart car charger and locator. This German-designed device fits discreetly in your car’s 12v power socket, features a dual USB port, and is compatible with both Android and iOS devices.
